1391090.name: BUGWORLD:ONLINE PRESENTS MITCH MAKER
1391090.description:
BUGWORLD:ONLINE PRESENTS MITCH MAKER is a fully complete Mike Mitchell creation system. Create and save your own custom Mitch!

Newly added: Experience fear like never before with Mitch's new "Afraid of Ghosts Ability," which gives him a speed boost when he sees a ghastly apparition.

Mitch Maker is a complete experience, serving as a preview for the character creator in upcoming MMO BUGWORLD:ONLINE.
1391090.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
